title: How to Make a Tortilla Cheese Roll Up

steps.headline: Gather up your ingredients.
steps.description: The ingredients are really easy to find at Walmart or a local grocery store.

steps.headline: Rip off a paper towel and lay it down on a flat surface.
Sprinkle the cheese on the tortilla.
steps.description: Sprinkle as much cheese as you want on it. It's your choice!

steps.headline: Wrap the tortilla up.
steps.description: Wrap it as tight as you can.

steps.headline: Put the roll-up in your microwave for 15 seconds.
Let it cook thoroughly.
steps.description: If it's not cooked thoroughly, let it cook for extra time.

text: Gather up your ingredients. The ingredients are really easy to find at Walmart or a local grocery store. Rip off a paper towel and lay it down on a flat surface.  Sprinkle the cheese on the tortilla. Sprinkle as much cheese as you want on it. It's your choice! Wrap the tortilla up. Wrap it as tight as you can. Put the roll-up in your microwave for 15 seconds.  Let it cook thoroughly. If it's not cooked thoroughly, let it cook for extra time. Finished.
